author: James Hibberd
title: Game of Thrones' Kristofer Hivju say he's recovered from coronavirus
description: Tormund Giantsbane actor Kristofer Hivju gives an update on his coronavirus recovery.
content:
He's scaled an 800-foot ice wall, killed hundreds of zombies and even slew a giant when he was a kid, so of course Tormund Giantsbane — a.k.a. Kristofer Hivju — defeated the coronavirus.
The Game of Thrones actor posted on social media that he is "fully cove… [+1303 chars]
